author: cheerful_piglet_95568
content: Hi all, Given that the HF for Goerli is happening on the 14th, do we know if there is a requirement on the minimum versions we need to be at for geth and lighthhouse?

author: pietjepuk
content: Yes. But those clients are not released yet. Pay attention to e.g. their respective release channels on Discord, they will explicitly mention Goerli

author: cheerful_piglet_95568
content: Thanks. could you pls point me to what the release channels are for geth and lightouse? I didnt see any specific to those.

author: pietjepuk
content: Well, you can follow the announcement channel on EthStaker discord (which relays those messages), or the Geth and Lighthouse discords

author: pietjepuk
content:
